title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - There is an issue with the source path in declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars. Currently, the source path is listed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.class'. This issue can be reproduced by running the code provided in the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' folder. It is important to note that these tests may return false positives as filename checking is not enabled in harness verification of messages. Additionally, it seems that AJDT simply omits the filename if it does not make sense to AJDT.
OB: The declare warning messages for binary files list the source path in the incorrect format - 'app.Main.class'
EB: The declare warning messages for binary files should list the source path in the correct format - 'app/Main.class'
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the code provided in the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' folder
2. Observe the declare warning messages and note that the source path is listed in the incorrect format
3. The source path should be listed in the format 'app/Main.class'
